name: Easy Peasy Lemon Squeezy
description:
The gameplay is simple: jump through the gap of the obstacles and change the color according to the gap. Sounds easy - but it's actually harder than expected. This simple endless runner is a polished version of my solo project which I originally created on the global game jam 2018.

Note: The leaderboard is still a bit laggy. This will be fixed in the near future as soon as I have finished my other university stuff.  The possibility to change keybindings should also follow!

Recommended screen resolution 16:9 (1920 x 1080)

If you want to give me feedback, feel free to write me in the comments or click on this link to fill out the Google form https://forms.gle/CAZyN4SdAyER85bQ9.

Thanks to my friends and family for playtesting♥

! an update with bug fixes is planned for Sunday, October 24th, 2020 !
